name: ASMR Simulator (itch)
description:
Hard job?
Stressful life?
Need relaxation?

We have the solution:
THE ASMR SIMULATOR!

Put on your headphones and turn down everything that‘s keeping you awake at night. Forget about your boss who‘s giving you hell on a regular basis. Or your wife who‘s probably cheating on you at this very moment. Or those student loans which will keep you in debt for the rest of your life. The ASMR Simulator is here to help.

Key Features
- Relaxing high definition sounds
- Available for Windows and Linux
- Colorful buttons
- Support for 4K screens
